LanguageData.VTE_BondedAnimalDiedHater.stages.0.label: bonded animal {0} died
LanguageData.VTE_BondedAnimalDiedHater.stages.0.descr: Such a gross, annoying animal. I'm glad it's gone!
LanguageData.VTE_BondedAnimalLostHater.stages.0.label: bonded animal {0} lost
LanguageData.VTE_BondedAnimalLostHater.stages.0.descr: Such a gross, annoying animal. I'm glad it's gone!
LanguageData.VTE_BondedAnimalBanishedHater.stages.0.d: My bonded animal was banished, finally.
LanguageData.VTE_NuzzledHater.stages.0.label: nuzzled
LanguageData.VTE_SoldMyBondedAnimalHater.stages.0.des: My nasty bonded animal was given away, about time!
LanguageData.VTE_SoldMyBondedAnimalMoodHater.stages.0: My nasty bonded animal was given away, about time!
LanguageData.VTE_BondedAnimalMasterHater.stages.0.des: Being around that nasty thing makes me hate life itself.
LanguageData.VTE_BondedAnimalMasterHater.stages.1.des: Being around that nasty thing makes me hate life itself.
That thing may like me, but I certainly don't like it back - I'm glad somebody else took it.
That thing may like me, but I certainly don't like it back - I'm glad somebody else took it.
LanguageData.VTE_CreatedLowQualityItem.stages.0.label: Created low quality item
LanguageData.VTE_CreatedLowQualityItem.stages.0.descr: I crafted junk. I feel like I can't do anything right.
LanguageData.VTE_CouldNotFinishItem.stages.0.label: Ð¡ould not finish item
LanguageData.VTE_CouldNotFinishItem.stages.0.descript: I couldn't finish my project, it just wasn't coming along correctly.
LanguageData.VTE_PassionateCleaningWork.stages.0.desc: I actually really enjoy organizing and cleaning up the place.
LanguageData.VTE_MyRivalsAreAlive.stages.0.label: My rivals are alive
LanguageData.VTE_MyRivalsAreAlive.stages.0.descriptio: I hate them. Why should they deserve to live?
LanguageData.VTE_MechanoidIsKilled.stages.0.label: Mechanoid died
LanguageData.VTE_MechanoidIsKilled.stages.0.descripti: Those evil machines don't deserve to function.
LanguageData.VTE_ObservedManyBlood.stages.0.label: observed many blood
LanguageData.VTE_ObservedManyBlood.stages.0.descripti: I saw so much blood and bits. Just remembering it makes me gag.
LanguageData.VTE_WatchedTelevisor.stages.0.label: Watched television recently
LanguageData.VTE_WatchedTelevisor.stages.0.descriptio: I got to laze around and catch up on my shows.
LanguageData.VTE_NoDedicatedLaboratory.stages.0.label: No dedicated laboratory
LanguageData.VTE_NoDedicatedLaboratory.stages.0.descr: I have nowhere to study in peace, how annoying.
LanguageData.VTE_AnimalsInColony.stages.0.label: No animals in the colony
LanguageData.VTE_AnimalsInColony.stages.0.description: We don't have a single animal.
LanguageData.VTE_AnimalsInColony.stages.1.label: Hardly any animals in the colony
LanguageData.VTE_AnimalsInColony.stages.1.description: We have hardly any animals in the colony, this sucks.
LanguageData.VTE_AnimalsInColony.stages.2.label: Hardly any animals in the colony
LanguageData.VTE_AnimalsInColony.stages.2.description: We have hardly any animals in the colony, it's something I guess.

LanguageData.VTE_AnimalsInColony.stages.3.description: We have hardly any animals in the colony, it's something I guess.
LanguageData.VTE_AnimalsInColony.stages.4.label: A few animals in the colony
LanguageData.VTE_AnimalsInColony.stages.4.description: We have a few animals in the colony, that's nice.
LanguageData.VTE_AnimalsInColony.stages.5.label: A few animals in the colony
LanguageData.VTE_AnimalsInColony.stages.5.description: We have a few animals in the colony, that's nice.
LanguageData.VTE_AnimalsInColony.stages.6.label: Some animals in the colony
LanguageData.VTE_AnimalsInColony.stages.6.description: We've got a decent amount of animals now, we're getting there.

LanguageData.VTE_AnimalsInColony.stages.10.label: Lots of animals in the colony
LanguageData.VTE_AnimalsInColony.stages.10.descriptio: We've got a lot of animals around the colony now, they're wonderful.
LanguageData.VTE_AnimalsInColony.stages.11.label: Lots of animals in the colony
LanguageData.VTE_AnimalsInColony.stages.11.descriptio: We've got a lot of animals around the colony now, they're wonderful.
LanguageData.VTE_AnimalsInColony.stages.12.label: Lots of animals in the colony
LanguageData.VTE_AnimalsInColony.stages.12.descriptio: We've got a lot of animals around the colony now, they're wonderful.
LanguageData.VTE_AnimalsInColony.stages.13.label: A ton of animals in the colony
LanguageData.VTE_AnimalsInColony.stages.13.descriptio: We've got so many animals now! It makes me so happy to see them all!
LanguageData.VTE_AnimalsInColony.stages.14.label: A ton of animals in the colony
LanguageData.VTE_AnimalsInColony.stages.14.descriptio: We've got so many animals now! It makes me so happy to see them all!

LanguageData.VTE_AnimalsInColony.stages.15.descriptio: We've got so many animals now! It makes me so happy to see them all!
LanguageData.VTE_ChildOfSea.stages.0.label: Ocean lover
LanguageData.VTE_ChildOfSea.stages.0.description: I just love being around the ocean and rivers, water is beautiful.
LanguageData.VTE_ChildOfMountain.stages.0.label: Mountain lover
LanguageData.VTE_ChildOfMountain.stages.0.description: I just love being around the mountains, they take my breath away.
LanguageData.VTE_HaventHarvestedOrgansForLongTime.sta: I'm growing impatient and bored, I need more subjects.
LanguageData.VTE_HarvestedOrgans.stages.0.label: Harvested organs
LanguageData.VTE_HarvestedOrgans.stages.0.description: The operation went just as expected, my collection has grown.
LanguageData.VTE_HaventExitedColonyForLongTime.stages: I haven't left home in a while, I'd really like to travel for a change.
LanguageData.VTE_EnvironmentDark.stages.0.label: darkness
LanguageData.VTE_EnvironmentDark.stages.0.description: I've been in the dark for a while. I like it.
LanguageData.VTE_Dunce.stages.0.label: Dunce
LanguageData.VTE_Dunce.stages.0.description: I don't really understand why everybody's so upset all the time.
